pageContext.claim: “Soleimani was actively planning new attacks, but we ended his bloody rampage forever.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump at first said the drone strike that killed a top Iranian commander, Qasem Soleimani, was warranted because he was planning an "imminent" attack. But that justification began to shift in following days, and Trump eventually said it “doesn't really matter” whether a “future attack by terrorist Soleimani was ‘imminent’ or not.”
